#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    ll se=0;
    ll so=0,a;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {cin>>a;
        if(a%2==0)
            se++;
        else
            so++;
    }
   // printf("%lld",abs(so-se));
    cout<<abs(se-so)<<endl;
}
